name: com.reecegriffin.c-comment-button
title: C style comment button
description: Inspired by Dreamweaver's code editor.  Allows you to apply/remove c-style comments to/from the currently selected text without touching your keyboard.  C-style comments are the same /* ... */ format that is used in c, c++, Objective-C, PHP, Java, JavaScript, C#, and CSS
author: Reece Griffin <reece@reecegriffin.com> (http://www.reecegriffin.com)
